tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE AgentInteractions (
    interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    agent_id UUID,
    action_performed VARCHAR(255),
    reward_id UUID REFERENCES Rewards(reward_id),
    interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE rewards (
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 agent_id INT NOT NULL,
 reward_value FLOAT NOT NULL,
 created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
 updated_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE agent_actions (
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 agent_id INT NOT NULL,
 action_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 action_value FLOAT NOT NULL,
 created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
 updated_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 agent_id INT NOT NULL,
 interaction_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 interaction_value FLOAT NOT NULL,
 created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE agent_rewards (
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 agent_id INT NOT NULL,
 total_reward FLOAT NOT NULL,
 average_reward FLOAT NOT NULL,
 created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    agent_id UUID,
    interaction_time TIMESTAMP,
    reward_id UUID,
    FOREIGN KEY (reward_id) REFERENCES rewards(id)
);

CREATE TABLE agent_logs (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    agent_id UUID,
    log_message TEXT,
    log_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (agent_id) REFERENCES agents(id)
);

CREATE TABLE agent_actions (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    agent_id UUID,
    action_name VARCHAR(255),
    action_value FLOAT,
    action_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (agent_id) REFERENCES agents(id)
);
